scenes.description: Performance of the song 'World is Mine'.
Performance of the song 'Love is an Illusion'.

subtitles.original: そう言う お熱い心へ
subtitles.english: To such a hot heart

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: よれ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original:
ワールドイズマイン
作詞・作曲：ryo (supercell)
subtitles.english:
World is Mine
Lyrics & Composition: ryo (supercell)

subtitles.original: その一
subtitles.english: Number one

subtitles.original: いつもと違う髪型に気がつくこと
subtitles.english: Make sure you notice when my hairstyle is different from usual

subtitles.original: その二
subtitles.english: Number two

subtitles.original: ちゃんと靴まで見ること いいね？
subtitles.english: Make sure you look all the way down to my shoes, got it?

subtitles.original: その三
subtitles.english: Number three

subtitles.original: 私の一言には三つの言葉で返事すること
subtitles.english: For every word I say, reply with three

subtitles.original: わかったら右手がお留守なのを
subtitles.english: If you understand, then do something about

subtitles.original: 何とかして！
subtitles.english: how my right hand is feeling lonely!

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything

subtitles.original: キミに心から思って欲しいの
subtitles.english: I just want you to think from the bottom of your heart

subtitles.original: かわいいって
subtitles.english: that I'm cute

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: I'm the number one princess in the world

subtitles.original: 気がついて ねえねえ
subtitles.english: Notice me, hey, hey

subtitles.original: 待たせるなんて論外よ
subtitles.english: Keeping me waiting is out of the question

subtitles.original: 私を誰だと思ってるの？
subtitles.english: Who do you think I am?

subtitles.original: もうなんだか
subtitles.english: I'm starting to feel like

subtitles.original: 甘いものが食べたい！
subtitles.english: I want to eat something sweet!

subtitles.original: 今すぐによ
subtitles.english: Right this instant!

subtitles.original: Check one, two!
subtitles.english: Check one, two!

subtitles.original: 欠点？ かわいいの間違いでしょ
subtitles.english: Flaws? You must mean "cute," right?

subtitles.original: 文句は許しませんの
subtitles.english: I won't allow any complaints

subtitles.original: あのね、私の話ちゃんと聞いてる？ ちょっと...
subtitles.english: Hey, are you listening to me? Wait...

subtitles.original: あ、それとね 白いお馬さん 決まってるでしょ？
subtitles.english: Oh, and also, a white horse is a given, right?

subtitles.original: 迎えに来て
subtitles.english: Come pick me up

subtitles.original: わかったら跪いて
subtitles.english: If you understand, kneel down,

subtitles.original: 手を取って「おひめさま」って
subtitles.english: take my hand, and call me "Princess"

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything

subtitles.original: でもね 少しくらい叱ってくれたっていいのよ
subtitles.english: But you know, it's okay to scold me just a little bit

subtitles.original: 世界で私だけの王子さま
subtitles.english: You're my one and only prince in the world

subtitles.original: 気がついて ほらほら
subtitles.english: Notice me, look, look

subtitles.original: おててが空いてます
subtitles.english: My hand is empty

subtitles.original: 無口で無愛想な王子さま
subtitles.english: My silent and blunt prince

subtitles.original: もう どうして！
subtitles.english: Oh, why?!

subtitles.original: 気がついてよ早く
subtitles.english: Hurry up and notice

subtitles.original: 絶対キミはわかってない！
subtitles.english: You definitely don't understand!

subtitles.original: わかってないわ...
subtitles.english: You don't understand...

subtitles.original: いちごの乗ったショートケーキ
subtitles.english: Strawberry shortcake

subtitles.original: こだわり卵のとろけるプリン
subtitles.english: Melting pudding made with special eggs

subtitles.original: みんな みんな 我慢します...
subtitles.english: I'll endure them all, every single one...

subtitles.original: わがままな子だと思わないで
subtitles.english: Please don't think I'm a selfish girl

subtitles.original: 私だってやればできるもん
subtitles.english: I can do it if I try

subtitles.original: あとで後悔するわよ
subtitles.english: You'll regret it later!

subtitles.original: 当然です！ だって私は
subtitles.english: It's only natural! Because I am...

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: the number one princess in the world

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見ててよね
subtitles.english: Make sure you're watching me

subtitles.original: どこかに行っちゃうよ？
subtitles.english: Or I'll go off somewhere, you know?

subtitles.original: ふいに抱きしめられた 急に そんな ええっ？
subtitles.english: You suddenly hugged me—just like that, out of nowhere? Eh?!

subtitles.original: 「轢かれる、危ないよ」
subtitles.english: "You'll get hit, it's dangerous"

subtitles.original: そう言ってそっぽ向くキミ
subtitles.english: You say that and look away

subtitles.original: こっちのが危ないわよ
subtitles.english: You're the one who's more dangerous!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Hey baby!
subtitles.english: Hey baby!

subtitles.original:
恋はイリュージョン
作詞：三森すずこ
作曲：矢野博康
subtitles.english:
Love is an Illusion
Lyrics: Suzuko Mimori
Composition: Hiroyasu Yano

subtitles.original: 街の灯りが滲んでる
subtitles.english: The city lights are blurring

subtitles.original: そっと手で触れそうな三日月
subtitles.english: A crescent moon that looks like I could gently touch it

subtitles.original: あなたに会える特別な
subtitles.english: On this special night when I can see you
